marklogic.body:
I have to tell you about an encounter yesterday. I had to take my two dogs to the vet yesterday. We have a bad epidemic of kennel Cough going through our city, so i felt I needed to vaccinate my dogs. We ar in contact with rescue dogs and at least 2 rescues, including the one I do volunteer fundraising for has had dogs with it. So we went.
There was a lady with her son and Golden Lab or maybe a German Shepherd, anyways. She saw me standing there and one of my boys, Scrappy was peeking around the corner, watching. Leo didn't even notice. I explained to her why I was standing there and she said that was fine and told me how her dog had been attacked by a group of small dogs and ever since has been skittish around small dogs. First time ever! I usually get but my dog is friendly to which I have to respond mine are not. They are great when Off leash or with their own breed (Leo is a senior long haired miniature dachshund and Scrappy is a wire haired dachshund fox terrier cross), however when on leash, Leo is aggressive which triggers Scrappy.
Nice to see a dog owner who gets it :)
